title: In which order should I read the following books 'The Power of Habit', 'Atomic Habits', 'High Performance Habits'? - Quora

response.answer_text: First of all you should go for the book named  “The power of habit” because this book helps you to understand about the practical reasons about how the habit works various terms affecting a particular habit like willpower,21 days challenge….etc. once you know all the science behind how our habit works you can then go forward to learn about the proof i.e. experimental proof and this book provides you with enough experimental proof about how habit work, Delaying gratification - marshmallow experiment etc…now once you know about the basis of how habit work you can then proceed further to read the book  “ATOMIC HABITS”, this book further explains about little but important habit then you can proceed for High performance habits  Thanks, image source: google
